TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PeerNameType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义要创建的 的类型。

span.span: Defines the type of to create.

summary.span: 对等名称可以是安全的，也可以是不安全的。

span.span: A peer name is either secured or unsecured.

summary.span: 安全的对等名称提供名称所有权证明。

span.span: A secured peer name provides a proof of ownership of the name.

summary.span: 不安全的对等名称没有关联的标识。

span.span: An unsecured peer name has no identity associated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 节点必须有权访问与公钥相关联的私钥用于创建安全，以便在证明所有权。A node must have access to the private key associated with the public key, used in creating the secured , in order to prove ownership. 节点不具有到一个公钥关系。The node does not have a relationship to a public key. 对等机名称的格式：*颁发*。The format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 值取决于名称是否是安全的对等名称或不安全的对等名称。The value of depends on whether the name is a secured peer name or an unsecured peer name. 名称的一部分可设置为包含 15 个或更少的 Unicode 字符，包括任何字符串`null`终止符。The part of the name can be set to any string that contains 15 or fewer Unicode characters, including the `null` terminator. 一次，并且已建立对等方的安全级别，对等方还对其的相对名称或主机名引用。Once the , and security level of a peer have been established, a peer can also be referred to with a relative name or a host name. 只有所有者或对等主机可注册与一个安全的对等名称[PNRP Namespace 提供程序 API](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=92731)。Only the owner, or peer host, can register a secure peer name with the [PNRP Namespace Provider API](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=92731). 任何节点可以声明任何不安全的所有权。Any node can claim ownership to any unsecured . **请注意**使用安全不能确保网络应用程序的整体安全性。**Note** Using a secured does not ensure the overall security of a networking application. 应用程序的安全性是视具体实现而定的。Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameType Secured = int32(0)

summary.span: 使用当前用户的标识创建一个安全的 。

span.span: Create a secured using the identity of current user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameType Unsecured = int32(1)

summary.span: 使用当前用户的标识创建一个不安全的 。

span.span: Create an unsecured using the identity of current user.
